Pr\u00e9requis: Etre inscrit au Mastère Spécialisé "Infrastructure Project Finance"
Objectifs du module: To give participants an understanding of major theoretical perspectives on the nature of effective negotiation & to provide a framework for translating negotiation theory and research into effective practice
Programme du module: Contents - Management of the relationship in international business - Cross-cultural communication practice - Methods and practices of communication applied to negotiation - Simulation of negotiations by stages Preparation of negotiation plan, evaluation of BATNA Sequencing the negotiation from contact to conclusion Impact of culture on negotiation, - Cross-cultural negotiations - Practice by case studies from international tendering procedures - Practice by case studies from B to B negotiations Course with examples, case studies. Qualité de la discussion 50% et du travail final 50%
